extension.news: - Core: Support Kodi hard exit (e.g. force closing or closing the Kodi window on Windows); try to properly send stopped state to Plex Server when this happens (fixes "dangling" sessions) - Core/CoreELEC/LG WebOS: Only default to Alternate seek if superviseaudiodelay is not set in advancedsettings.xml (thanks @MikeTeavee) - Player: Fix rare error on playbackTime - Home: Add context menu option to start playback from beginning for in progress items - Revert "Core: Implement faster account switching for users in PlexHome (skip server refresh/reachability tests if preferred server is connectable)"
